welcome_message_body: "Welcome to London Colney, a charming town known for its beautiful countryside and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our charming city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Luton Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern facilities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering exclusive services for VIP passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The first terminal to be built at Heathrow Airport, serving domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly European and some long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving long-haul flights and some European destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The main terminal for SkyTeam airlines and some other international carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving British Airways and its partners.

wifi.note: Free for 45 minutes, then charges apply for longer usage.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to VIP and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
